author: Lukas Reiter
script:
"""
This script scans all in-scope HTTP responses for known software versions and adds
identified software information to the table above.
"""
# Do the initial setup
if ref == 1 or "attributes" not in session:
	session["attributes"] = ["software", "version", "type", "alias", "cpe"]
	header = ["Ref.", "URL"]
	header.extend(session["attributes"])
# Process only in-scope HTTP responses
response = message_info.getResponse()
if in_scope and response:
	response_string = helpers.bytesToString(response).encode("utf-8")
	results = find_versions(response_string)
	for item in results:
		row=[]
		for attribute in session["attributes"]:
			row.append(item[attribute] if item[attribute] else "")
		tmp = [ref, url]
		tmp.extend(row)
		rows.append(tmp)
name: Misc - Template Script to Scan Project for Known Software Versions
